testcase.name: completeECommerceWorkflow
testcase.system-out: Driver quit successfully in thread: main ===== TEST TEARDOWN COMPLETE - Thread: main ===== Database connection closed Database connected for validation ChromeDriver initialized (Incognito mode) in thread: main ===== TEST SETUP COMPLETE - Browser: chrome | Thread: main | URL: https://www.saucedemo.com ===== === STARTING FULL E-COMMERCE WORKFLOW WITH DB VALIDATION === LoginPage initialized with Page Factory Step: Entered username -> standard_user Step: Entered password Step: Clicked Login button Step: Valid login completed DB Validation: User 'standard_user' exists in DB ProductsPage initialized Wait completed - element is visible Step: Products page displayed -> true Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Sorted products by -> Name (A to Z) Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Sorted products by -> Price (low to high) Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Added to cart -> Sauce Labs Backpack Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Added to cart -> Sauce Labs Bike Light Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Added to cart -> Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket Wait completed - element is visible Step: Cart badge visible, count = 3 Step: 3 products added & cart count verified DB Validation: product 'Sauce Labs Backpack' has quantity 10 and is available Step: Navigated to Cart via header Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Removed from cart -> Sauce Labs Bike Light Wait completed - element is visible Step: Cart badge visible, count = 2 Step: Item removed & cart count verified Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Clicked Continue Shopping Step: Navigated to Cart via header Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Clicked Checkout button Step: Filled shipping info -> John Doe 560001 Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Clicked Continue (to overview) Wait completed - element is clickable Step: Clicked Finish purchase Wait completed - element is visible Step: Order confirmation message -> Thank you for your order! Step: End-to-end purchase flow completed & validated DB Validation: order exists - ID: 1, Total: 49.99, Status: Completed === E-COMMERCE WORKFLOW TEST + DB VALIDATION PASSED SUCCESSFULLY ===
